displayName.spanish: ¿Y me dan una medalla así sin más?

description.english: Just finish your training. Easy.
description.german: Schließe dein Training ab. Mehr nicht.
description.french: Finir votre entraînement. Facile.
description.italian: Finisci l'allenamento. Semplice.
description.spanish: Termina el entrenamiento. Ya está.

description.english: Learn the ropes collecting clues and talking to other agents in RIFT.
description.german: Sammle Anhaltspunkte und sprich mit anderen Agenten in RIFT, um das Spionieren zu lernen.
description.french: Apprendre les bases en recueillant des preuves et en parlant à d'autres agents au RIFT.
description.italian: Impara i rudimenti raccogliendo indizi e parlando con gli altri agenti alla RIFT.
description.spanish: Aprende lo básico buscando pistas y hablando con otros agentes de RIFT.

description.english: Find enough evidence to locate and put Ripjaw away.
description.german: Finde genug Indizien, um Ripjaw zu finden und einzusperren.
description.french: Rassembler assez de preuves pour trouver et arrêter Ripjaw.
description.italian: Trova prove sufficienti a individuare e arrestare Ripjaw.
description.spanish: Consigue las pruebas necesarias para encontrar y detener a Ripjaw.

description.english: Stop Ripjaw from terrorizing Reptarria.
description.german: Beschütze Reptarria vor Ripjaw.
description.french: Empêcher Ripjaw de terroriser Reptarria.
description.italian: Impedisci a Ripjaw di terrorizzare Reptarria.
description.spanish: Pon punto final al reinado del terror de Ripjaw en Reptilia.

description.english: Find enough evidence to put Hancho away.
description.german: Finde genug Indizien, um Hancho einzusperren.
description.french: Rassembler assez de preuves pour arrêter Hancho.
description.italian: Trova prove sufficienti ad arrestare Hancho.
description.spanish: Reúne las pruebas necesarias para encarcelar a Hancho.

displayName.spanish: El que no arriesga, no gana

description.english: Recover the Pineapple Files from Hancho.
description.german: Hol dir die Ananas-Akten von Hancho zurück.
description.french: Récupérer les dossiers Ananas des mains d'Hancho.
description.italian: Recupera i Dossier Ananas sottratti da Hancho.
description.spanish: Recupera el Expediente Piña que tiene Hancho.

description.english: Find enough evidence to identify the culprit in Gootopia.
description.german: Finde genug Indizien, um den Schuldigen auf Glibbertopia zu finden.
description.french: Rassembler assez de preuves pour identifier le coupable sur Fangetopia.
description.italian: Trova prove sufficienti a identificare il colpevole a Melmotopia.
description.spanish: Reúne las pruebas necesarias para identificar al culpable en Pringuedal.

description.english: Save the hostages in Gootopia.
description.german: Rette die Geiseln auf Glibbertopia.
description.french: Sauver les otages sur Fangetopia.
description.italian: Salva gli ostaggi a Melmotopia.
description.spanish: Rescata a los rehenes de Pringuedal.

displayName.french: Il ne faut pas se laisser abattre

description.english: Defeat... yourself?
description.german: Besiege ... dich selbst?
description.french: Mener un combat contre... vous-même ?
description.italian: Sconfiggi... te stessa.
description.spanish: Tienes que... ¿vencerte a ti misma?

description.english: Discover the identity of Suspect X and solve the mystery.
description.german: Decke die Identität von Verdächtiger X auf und löse das Rätsel.
description.french: Démasquer le Suspect X et lever le voile sur ce mystère.
description.italian: Scopri l'identità di Sospettato X e svela il mistero.
description.spanish: Resuelve el misterio y descubre quién es el Agente X.

description.english: Discover the TRUE identity of Suspect X!
description.german: Decke die WAHRE Identität des Verdächtigen X auf!
description.french: Découvrir la VÉRITABLE identité du Suspect X !
description.italian: Scopri la VERA identità di Sospettato X!
description.spanish: Resuelve el misterio y descubre quién es el Agente X.

description.english: Collect 57 out of 114 pieces of Upgradium.
description.german: Sammle 57 von 114 Stücken Upgradium.
description.french: Récupérer 57 morceaux d'upgradium sur les 114 qui existent.
description.italian: Raccogli 57 delle 114 unità di Upgradium.
description.spanish: Reúne 57 de los 114 trozos de mejórium.

description.english: Find all 114 pieces of Upgradium.
description.german: Sammle alle 114 Stücke Upgradium.
description.french: Trouver les 114 morceaux d'upgradium.
description.italian: Trova tutte le 114 unità di Upgradium.
description.spanish: Encuentra los 114 trozos de mejórium.

description.english: Beat the final area without any equipment.
description.german: Schließe das letzte Areal ohne Upgrades ab.
description.french: Terminer la zone finale sans aucune amélioration.
description.italian: Completa l'ultima area senza potenziamenti.
description.spanish: Supera el área final sin mejoras.

displayName.italian: Il piccolo grande mago dei videogames

description.english: Get the top score in every game in Funky's Arcadium.
description.german: Erziele die Höchstpunktzahl in allen Spielen in Funky's Arcadium.
description.french: Marquer le meilleur score à chaque partie dans l'Arcadium de Funky.
description.italian: Ottieni il punteggio massimo in ogni gioco all'Arcadium di Funky.
description.spanish: Consigue la mejor puntuación en todos los juegos de Funky's Arcadium.

displayName.spanish: El Demonio Veloz de Reptilia I

description.english: Complete Firebrand Factory Mission in 15:00.
description.german: Schließe die Mission „Feuerbrand-Fabrik“ in 15′ 00″ ab.
description.french: Terminer la mission Usine Tison en 15:00.
description.italian: Completa la missione Fabbrica Tizzoni in 15:00.
description.spanish: Supera la misión de la Fábrica Tizón en 15:00 o menos.

displayName.spanish: El Demonio Veloz de Reptilia II

description.english: Complete Heavy Metal Oasis Mission in 15:00.
description.german: Schließe die Mission „Schwermetall-Oase“ in 15′ 00″ ab.
description.french: Terminer la mission Oasis du Métalleux en 15:00.
description.italian: Completa la missione Oasi Metalli Pesanti in 15:00.
description.spanish: Supera la misión del Oasis Metalero en 15:00 o menos.

displayName.spanish: El Demonio Veloz de Reptilia III

description.english: Complete Bone Crackle Canyon Mission in 15:00.
description.german: Schließe die Mission „Knochenknacker-Canyon“ in 15′ 00″ ab.
description.french: Terminer la mission Canyon Crépitos en 15:00.
description.italian: Completa la missione Canyon Scrocchiaossa in 15:00.
description.spanish: Supera la misión del Cañón Quebrantahuesos en 15:00 o menos.

displayName.spanish: El Demonio Veloz de Pringuedal I

description.english: Complete Slimy Mire Mission in 15:00.
description.german: Schließe die Mission „Schleimschlamm“ in 15′ 00″ ab.
description.french: Terminer la mission Fange visqueuse en 15:00.
description.italian: Completa la missione Palude Vischiosa in 15:00.
description.spanish: Supera la misión de la Ciénaga Pegajosa en 15:00.

displayName.spanish: El Demonio Veloz de Pringuedal II

description.english: Complete Goo Grotto Mission in 15:00.
description.german: Schließe die Mission „Glibbergrotte“ in 15′ 00″ ab.
description.french: Terminer la mission Fangegrotte en 15:00.
description.italian: Completa la missione Grotta Viscida in 15:00.
description.spanish: Supera la misión de la Cueva Pringosa en 15:00.

displayName.spanish: El Demonio Veloz de Pringuedal III

description.english: Complete SPHERE Station Mission in 15:00.
description.german: Schließe die Mission „WITZ-Station“ in 15′ 00″ ab.
description.french: Terminer la mission Station de RIMES en 15:00.
description.italian: Completa la missione Stazione SFERA in 15:00.
description.spanish: Supera la misión de la Estación CIFRA en 15:00.

displayName.italian: Saetta di Cupola del Gioco I
displayName.spanish: El Demonio Veloz de la Ludocúpula I

description.english: Complete Kaneda Boulevard Mission in 15:00.
description.german: Schließe die Mission „Kaneda-Boulevard“ in 15′ 00″ ab.
description.french: Terminer la mission Kaneda Boulevard en 15:00.
description.italian: Completa la missione Kaneda Boulevard in 15:00.
description.spanish: Supera la misión de Kaneda Boulevard en 15:00 o menos.

displayName.italian: Saetta di Cupola del Gioco II
displayName.spanish: El Demonio Veloz de la Ludocúpula II

description.english: Comeplete Tolmekia Palace Mission in 15:00.
description.german: Schließe die Mission „Tolmekia-Palast“ in 15′ 00″ ab.
description.french: Terminer la mission Palais de Tolmekia en 15:00.
description.italian: Completa la missione Palazzo Tolmekia in 15:00.
description.spanish: Supera la misión del palacio de Tolmekia en 15:00 o menos.

description.english: Defeat a boss using the fireball technique.
description.german: Besiege einen Bossgegner mit der Feuerball-Technik.
description.french: Vaincre un boss au moyen de la technique de la boule de feu.
description.italian: Sconfiggi un boss usando la Palla di Fuoco.
description.spanish: Vence a un jefe con la técnica de las bolas de fuego.

description.english: Complete all of your missions except Funky's Arcadium without losing all of your health.
description.german: Schließe alle Missionen außer „Funky's Arcadium“ ab, ohne dein gesamtes Leben zu verlieren.
description.french: Terminer toutes les missions sauf Arcadium de Funky sans perdre tous vos PV.
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni tranne Arcadium di Funky senza perdere tutta l'energia.
description.spanish: Supera todas las misiones, excepto Funky's Arcadium, sin perder toda la vida.

description.english: Defeat the final boss with the Glass Cannon upgrade equipped.
description.german: Besiege den letzten Bossgegner mit dem Glaskanonen-Upgrade.
description.french: Vaincre le boss final, équipé de l'amélioration Canon de verre.
description.italian: Sconfiggi l'ultimo boss con il potenziamento Cannone di Vetro equipaggiato.
description.spanish: Derrota al jefe final con el cañón de cristal equipado.

description.english: Help V"!!k}~X join the RIFT academy.
description.german: Hilf V"!!k}~X, der RIFT-Akademie beizutreten.
description.french: Aider V"!!k}~X à rejoindre l'académie RIFT.
description.italian: Aiuta V"!!k}~X a entrare nell'Accademia RIFT.
description.spanish: Ayuda a V"!!k}~X a entrar en la academia RIFT.

description.english: Talk to an arrested friend before the invasion.
description.german: Sprich vor der Invasion mit einem inhaftierten Freund.
description.french: Parler à un ami arrêté avant l'invasion.
description.italian: Parla con un amico arrestato prima dell'invasione.
description.spanish: Habla con un amigo arrestado antes de la invasión.

description.english: Listen to gossip from 5 characters.
description.german: Höre dir das Gerede von 5 Charakteren an.
description.french: Écouter les potins de 5 personnages.
description.italian: Ascolta i pettegolezzi di 5 personaggi.
description.spanish: Presta atención a lo que cuentan de 5 personajes.

description.english: Make someone lick the mysterious goo.
description.german: Bringe jemanden dazu, an dem mysteriösen Glibber zu lecken.
description.french: Faire en sorte que quelqu'un lèche la fange mystérieuse.
description.italian: Fai leccare a qualcuno la melma misteriosa.
description.spanish: Consigue que alguien le dé un lametón al pringue misterioso.

description.english: Show Director DeLabourde 10 clues that she doesn't care about.
description.german: Zeige Direktorin DeLabourde 10 Anhaltspunkte, für die sie sich nicht interessiert.
description.french: Montrer à la directrice DeLabourde 10 preuves dont elle se contrefiche.
description.italian: Mostra alla Direttrice DeLabourde 10 indizi che non le interessano.
description.spanish: Muestra a la directora DeLabourde 10 pruebas que no le interesen.

description.english: Show a love letter to at least 10 characters.
description.german: Zeige mindestens 10 Charakteren einen Liebesbrief.
description.french: Montrer une lettre d'amour à au moins 10 personnages.
description.italian: Mostra una lettera d'amore ad almeno 10 personaggi.
description.spanish: Entrega una carta de amor al menos a 10 personajes.

description.english: Reach the central computer in Tolmekia Palace before anyone knows you're there.
description.german: Erreiche den Zentralrechner im Tolmekia-Palast, ohne dass dich jemand entdeckt.
description.french: Atteindre l'ordinateur central au palais de Tolmekia avant de vous faire repérer.
description.italian: Raggiungi il computer centrale a Palazzo Tolmekia prima che qualcuno scopra che sei lì.
description.spanish: Llega hasta el ordenador central del palacio de Tolmekia sin que nadie te vea.

description.english: Get Valery and Dash's full storyline.
description.german: Erfahre die ganze Hintergrundgeschichte von Valery Wiseheart und Dash Sterling.
description.french: Obtenir l'histoire complète de Valery et Dash.
description.italian: Scopri la storia completa di Valery e Dash.
description.spanish: Revela lo ocurrido entre Valery y Dash.

description.english: Earn all Commendations.
description.german: Erhalte alle Auszeichnungen.
description.french: Gagner toutes les louanges.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti gli Elogi.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las medallas.
